channel.title: CVE Feed for GhozyLab -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GhozyLab -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2224|2024-08-03T00:32:08.673Z -- ghozylab -- gallery%20for%20social%20photo
item.description: The WordPress plugin Gallery for Social Photo is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including 1.0.0.27 due to failure to properly check for the existence of a nonce in the function gifeed_duplicate_feed. This make it possible for unauthenticated attackers to duplicate existing posts or pages granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2022-2223|2024-08-03T00:32:09.382Z -- ghozylab -- image%20slider
item.description: The WordPress plugin Image Slider is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including 1.1.121 due to failure to properly check for the existence of a nonce in the function ewic_duplicate_slider. This make it possible for unauthenticated attackers to duplicate existing posts or pages granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-32707|2024-06-04T17:51:10.790Z -- ghozylab -- image%20slider%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GhozyLab Image Slider Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Image Slider Widget: from n/a through 1.1.125.

item.title: CVE-2024-32707|2024-08-02T02:20:34.493Z -- ghozylab -- image%20slider%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GhozyLab Image Slider Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Image Slider Widget: from n/a through 1.1.125.
